Vars.var_description: Specifies the era unit.
Specifies the year unit.
Specifies the month unit.
Specifies the day unit.
Specifies the hour unit.
Specifies the minute unit.
Specifies the second unit.
Specifies the weekday unit.
Specifies the ordinal weekday unit.
Specifies the quarter of the calendar.
Specifies the original week of a month calendar unit.
Specifies the original week of the year calendar unit.
Specifies the year when the calendar is being interpreted as a week-based calendar.
Specifies the nanosecond unit.
Specifies the calendar of a date components object as an NSCalendar.
Specifies the time zone of a date components object as an NSTimeZone.
Specifies the era unit.DeprecatedUse era instead.
Specifies the year unit.DeprecatedUse year instead.
Specifies the month unit. DeprecatedUse month instead.
Specifies the day unit. DeprecatedUse day instead.
Specifies the hour unit.DeprecatedUse hour instead.
Specifies the minute unit.DeprecatedUse minute instead.
Specifies the second unit.DeprecatedUse second instead.
Specifies the week unit.DeprecatedUse weekOfMonth or weekOfYear instead.
Specifies the weekday unit.DeprecatedUse weekday instead.
Specifies the ordinal weekday unit. DeprecatedUse weekdayOrdinal instead.
Specifies the quarter of the calendar as a second. In macOS 10.6 and earlier this was defined as equal to quarter. In macOS 10.7 and later it is defined as (1 << 20).DeprecatedUse quarter instead.
Specifies the original week of a month calendar unit.DeprecatedUse weekOfMonth instead.
Specifies the original week of the year calendar unit.DeprecatedUse weekOfYear instead.
Specifies the year when the calendar is being interpreted as a week-based calendar. DeprecatedUse yearForWeekOfYear instead.
Specifies the calendar of the calendar.DeprecatedUse calendar instead.
Specifies the time zone of the calendar as an NSTimeZone.DeprecatedUse timeZone instead.

class_description: Calendar units may be used as a bit mask to specify a combination of units. Values in this enumeration are equal to the corresponding constants in CFCalendarUnit.
